title: Signal Out of Range! HELP ME! GOT BANNED TWICE CAUSE OF THIS
body: I was in game a few weeks ago and I got frustrated at how tiny my screen was, so i went to the in game settings and put the resolution down pretty low. Now my screen says it's out of range and i cant play anymore PLZ RIOT HELP ME

replies.body: I saw the NA comments about this and one of the admins said to open 'game.cfg' but i cant open it because windows doesn't let me http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=195584

Have you tried opening it as a notepad file?

Find the game.cfg, right click it, click "Open With" and find the option that will let you select "Notepad".

In the folder "Riot Games", default path being on the root of your C: drive, in League of Legends/Config, you'll find the configuration text document with your screen resolution in it. Note, it's probably not stored as the actual resolution (eg. 1200x768) but as a numerical option you can choose (eg. 2, which represents the second available option on the in-game dialogue).

I haven't actually edited that file so I can't be certain, but I'm sure you'll be able to find a guide for it somewhere on the internet.
